name: Grounded (Epic MegaJam 2019)
description:
This is a submission entry for the 2019 Epic MegaJam 

After drinking a weird soda you become super down to earth. so much so that you are afraid to leave the ground! Stay grounded while completing 3 levels with their own ways of moving about, from planking, rolling to doing the worm.

TEAM NAME : Team Faceplant

ASSETS : Everything was created from scratch for this Jam, except the sounds (they come from Soundly).

GAMEPLAY CONTROLS:

WASD / Left Joystick - Move

Space Bar / A - Action 

R / B - Retry

LINK TO GAMEPLAY FOOTAGE:

https://youtu.be/ud0I1cU3hvo
